citeinfo.origin: Allegheny County Division of Computer Services Geographic Information Systems Group
citeinfo.title: LandRecords.LANDRECORDS_OWNER.Parcels

descript.abstract: Boundary outlines of individual properties in Allegheny County.
descript.purpose: The Parcel Dataset was developed primarily for the purposes of identifying land parcels for tax billing and tax assessment purposes.

idinfo.useconst: All parties acknowledge that the data is for informational purposes only. The existing digital data is shipped as is and there is no guarantee as to its completeness or accuracy. Allegheny County is not responsible for any reliance upon said data.

cntorgp.cntorg: Allegheny County Division of Computer Services Geographic Information Systems Group

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.4000

attracc.attraccr: Data is based on Allegheny County Base Data which was produced at a scale of 1"=200'. Vector data is reconciled against tabular data contained in the Integrated Assessment System (IAS), Maintained by the Office of Property Assessments (OPA).

dataqual.logic: Data is based on other GIS Data developed and maintained by Allegheny County GIS Staff.
dataqual.complete: There is parcel data for all of Allegheny County.

horizpa.horizpar: Data is based on County Base Data horizontal positional accuracy. Both vector (street centerlines) and raster (digital orthophotography) are used to align parcel outlines correctly.

vertacc.vertaccr: Data is based on county base data vertical positional accuracy.

procstep.procdesc: Digital Parcel Data was collected from a variety of sources including, but not limited to: Duquesne Light, municipalities, COG's, engineering firms, etc. and was edgematched and assembled into a county-wide dataset. The Controller's Office Mapping Section digitized parcels in AutoCAD and assigned MapLotBlock numbers for the following municipalities: Bradford Woods Borough; Collier Township; Findlay Township; Marshall Township; McDonald Borough; North Fayette Township; Oakdale Borough; Pine Township; South Fayette Township. Those files were then added to the master parcel file.
GIS Database Manager and staff were moved to OPA and charged with developing and maintaining a complete parcel dataset

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Area of feature in internal units squared.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: GIS Notes - includes mapping tracking number
Temporary Parcel identifier assigned until official PIN could be certified by all officials
Parcel Identification Number including zeros to constitute a 16 digit field: 4 digit tile number, 1 alpha block character, 11 digit parcel identifier.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Area of feature in internal units squared.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

cntorgp.cntorg: Allegheny County Division Of Computer Services GIS Section
Allegheny County Division of Computer Services Geographic Information Systems Section
cntorgp.cntper: REQUIRED: The person responsible for the metadata information.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata
